title: Why AD Malph is legit. Screens attached

replies.body:
i tried that

rekt lane againts most melees

then at mid, get kited to fu.cking death 

ad mapl would work in bronze where vayne only tumble to kite. 

{{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}}

This only works because of his W, while he would do more DPS with his autoattacks than anyone else in the game (maybe aside from Jayce with his cannon W?) his abilities scale not with AD. He'd get kited beyond belief by a good ADC.

AD Malph works, I guess. You just gotta get a Ravenous Hydra and watch as you deal 100%+ AoE damage on auto's. And it's not like he has any problems getting close to his target with Q and ult. He can also duel other auto attackers thanks to the attack speed debuff on his ground slam.

Yeah :) I remember this one time the other team had this really feed tf that was split pushing ( 16/7/..).
All I had to do to take him out was walk in out from the jungle, jump on him, with my W 1 AA + hydra proc + E and he got deleted.
If played properly he's one of the best assassins in the game xD
There is no need to prove AD Malphite is legit. Most of us already know! Ravenous Hydra is fun on him. I imagine the 42 AP comes from runes and masteries though. Imagine if that was put to AD :D

Triforce and maybe base stats. can't say for sure.
I wanted to replace shiv with a PD and boots with a zephyr :(
